button.learnMore.description: Text on button used to learn more about the service.

button.apply.description: Text on button used to apply for the service.

button.introduction.description: Text on button used to view the service introduction.

button.apis.description: Text on button used to view the API description.

button.pricing.description: Text on button used to view pricing information.

field.apis.description: APIs of the service, where API is a form of online service.

field.proxies.description: Proxies of the service, which are a form of online service used for data transmission as HTTP proxies.

message.free.description: Text displayed when the service is free, indicating that the service is free.

message.around.description: Text displayed when the price is approximately at a specific value.

message.welcomeCredits.description: Text displayed when the service offers free welcome credits.

message.appliedCount.description: Text displayed when calculating the number of applications made.

message.indexTitle.message: Smart Choice for Your Digital Services

message.indexSubtitle.message: Empowering your work and life with standard excellence in service.

message.packages.message: We offer various credit packages, the more packages you purchase, the more discount you will get.
message.packages.description: Text displayed when the service offers credit packages.

message.offer.description: Text displayed when the service provides an offer.

title.apis.description: APIs of the service, where API is a form of online service.

title.proxies.description: Proxies of the service, which are a form of online service used for data transmission as HTTP proxies.

title.packages.description: Packages of the service, used to purchase credits. For example, the service offers 3 packages: $100 for 100 credits, $200 for 200 credits, $300 for 300 credits.

unit.credit.description: Credits are virtual currency used in API services.

unit.Credit.description: Credits are virtual currency used in API services, in uppercase form.

unit.credits.description: Credits are virtual currency used in API services, in plural form.

unit.Credits.description: Credits are virtual currency used in API services, in uppercase and plural form.

unit.call.description: Calls indicate the number of times the API service is called.

unit.Call.description: Calls indicate the number of times the API service is called, in uppercase form.

unit.calls.description: Calls indicate the number of times the API service is called, in plural form.

unit.Calls.description: Calls indicate the number of times the API service is called, in uppercase and plural form.

unit.MB.description: MB stands for Megabyte, a unit for digital information storage.

unit.GB.description: GB stands for Gigabyte, a unit for digital information storage.
